about_the_game:
Your hunt is your rules.

You must fight your way through crowds of vile monsters. They came to our world from different dimensions and realities, they know no mercy and are driven by one goal - to sow fear, destruction and death. Move, shoot, use magic, do everything to survive in this old-school boomer shooter.

In Survivors in Blood, you choose how you fight. Use only firearms or combine them with magic. Collect experience crystals from fallen enemies to improve the characteristics of your character. With each new level, you will have access to new destructive and defensive spells.

In Survivors in Blood you will face huge armies of enemies, act efficiently, move, use cover. Enemies are varied, some prefer close combat, some use the environment for their attacks, and others use magic. You must survive and fulfill your destiny at any cost!

Survivors in Blood is a tribute to the shooters of the past, a return to the days when gameplay was interesting and fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 or 12 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: A warrior can't find peace even after death if he's offered a reward for bringing back a demon determined to take over the Earth. Welcome back to the land of the living, take up arms, forget fear and go hunting!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian
